Roma (Queensland).title: Roma (Queensland)
Roma (Queensland).byline: Roma is a town in the Darling Downs region of Queensland, approximately 480 km west of Brisbane along the Warrego Highway.

Romania.title: Romania
Romania.byline: Romania (Romanian: România) is a country of great natural beauty and diversity and a rich cultural heritage, including a variety of ethnic, linguistic, and confessional groups.

Rome.title: Rome
Rome.byline: Rome (Italian and Latin: Roma), the 'Eternal City', is the capital and largest city of Italy and of the Lazio region.

Romney.title: Romney
Romney.byline: Romney is a city in the Potomac Highlands region of West Virginia.

Romsey.title: Romsey
Romsey.byline: Romsey is a picturesque market town in Hampshire, England.

Rome (New York).title: Rome (New York)
Rome (New York).byline: Rome is a city of 32,000 people (2020) in Central New York State, not far from Utica.

Romblon.title: Romblon
Romblon.byline: Romblon is an archipelago province of the Philippines.

Roman Empire.title: Roman Empire
Roman Empire.byline: The Roman Empire was the greatest ancient empire of Europe.
